Bill Hughes : wchughes.eth 🦊: An underreported item in #crypto news: FASB, the board that dictates accounting rules, has proposed that fungible crypto assets be marked to market on a company's books, not held at cost basis. BIG CHANGE. Also, crypto payments are booked as cash if converted immediately. https://t.co/fczxS5OlDu

entry.title: 吴说获悉，ConsenSys 律师 Bill Hughes 指出，制定会计规则的委员会 FASB 提议，加密资产在公司账簿上按市值计价，而不是按成本持有。他认为这是一个巨大的变化...
entry.summary: 吴说获悉，ConsenSys 律师 Bill Hughes 指出，制定会计规则的委员会 FASB 提议，加密资产在公司账簿上按市值计价，而不是按成本持有。他认为这是一个巨大的变化。此外如果加密资产被迅速转换为现金，加密支付将被记为现金，实体将被要求将这些现金收入分类为来自经营活动的现金流量。

entry.summary:
吴说获悉，Moonsama NFT 赢得 Polkadot 第 42 次平行链拍卖，该团队通过开发基础设施和实用解决方案，加速 NFT 驱动的应用程序进入市场，团队成员表示代表了这是项目迄今为止最大的里程碑，不仅增强了其技术堆栈的能力，还寻求在 Polkadot 中提供急需的价值部分生态系统。 https://twitter.com/Polkadot/status/1642836029651447808?s=19
Polkadot: 1/ The winner of #ParachainAuction 42 is confirmed as @MoonsamaNFT Moonsama accelerates the arrival of NFT-powered applications to the market by developing infrastructure and utility solutions. Congratulations to the team on joining Polkadot’s parachain family! https://t.co/1eajhHAXYW

entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe
